directions: In a food processor, blend the tuna, red bell pepper, onion, cilantro, capers, relish, mayonnaise, mustard, and garlic powder until smooth. Transfer to a bowl, and mix in the white beans. Garnish with parsley to serve.
ingredients: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked
2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, for garnish
title: White Beans and Tuna Salad
